ValidationRule.description: Alerts users that when data is missing in fields that are used to populate info into the welcome email.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(ISBLANK(Welcome_Email_Sent__c)), ISPICKVAL(Application_Status__c, "Setup Complete"), RecordType.Name = "Charter", ISBLANK( Order_Entry_User_ID__c ), ISBLANK( Order_Entry_Passcode__c ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage:
Please ensure the following fields are filled in before saving the record:
Order Entry User ID and Passcode
